# GitHub Repository Description

Use this description for your GitHub repository:

## Short Description (160 characters max)

```
Find meeting destinations for two people by searching flights with matching arrival times. Python app using Amadeus API. Easy to use, configurable, CSV output.
```

## Full Description

```
✈️ Fladar - Flight Meeting Destination Finder

Find the perfect meeting destination for two people by automatically searching flights with matching arrival times.

Features:
• Automatic destination discovery using Amadeus Flight API
• Smart flight matching based on arrival times
• Filter by price, stops, duration, and departure times
• Rich CSV output with local times and airline names
• Easy configuration via YAML
• Intelligent caching to reduce API calls
• Automatic timezone detection

Perfect for:
• Planning trips with friends or family
• Finding meeting points between two cities
• Discovering travel destinations
• Comparing flight options

Built with Python 3.11+, uses Amadeus Flight API for real-time flight data.

Keywords: flight search, find flights, flight API, Amadeus API, meeting destination, flight finder, travel planner, Python flight search
```

## How to Set Repository Description

1. Go to your GitHub repository
2. Click on the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About" section
3. Paste the short description in the "Description" field
4. Click "Save changes"

## Website URL (Optional)

If you want to add a website URL later:
- Add it in the "Website" field in the About section
- Or leave it empty for now
